name: png-es6
description: A PNG decoder in JavaScript ES6 that works in browsers and web workers

scripts.build: npm run build-vanilla && npm run build-browsers
scripts.build-vanilla: node build.js && node build.js -m && node build.js -e && node build.js -em && node build.js -eu && node build.js -emu
scripts.build-browsers: node build.js -b && node build.js -bm && node build.js -be && node build.js -bem && node build.js -beu && node build.js -bemu
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run test-browser && npm run test-browser-min
